definition: the act of referring (as forwarding an applicant for employment or referring a matter to an appropriate agency)
details:
noun
- the act of referring (as forwarding an applicant for employment or referring a matter to an appropriate agency)
- a recommendation to consult the professional person or group to whom one has been referred
= example: a recommendation to consult the professional person or group to whom one has been referred
- a person whose case has been referred to a specialist or professional group
= example: a person whose case has been referred to a specialist or professional group
